name: Skypark Platformer Game
description:
The Skypark Game is a single-player game where the aim is for the player to navigate a world of floating moving islands, find coins, boosters and a key to open the locked door and win the game! Don’t fall off the edge of the Skypark! 

Can you traverse the treacherous skies? 

_______________________________________________________________

Controls:

  • Mouse Click - Start Game
  • Mouse Control - Camera Movement
  • W,A,S,D - Move
  • Space Bar - Jump
  • E - Interact when prompted
  • Esc - End Game
